description: ESLint configuration file for Next.js with custom compatibility settings using '@eslint/eslintrc' and 'FlatCompat'. It extends Next.js core web vitals and TypeScript recommended configs.

methods.name: dirname
methods.description: Returns the directory name of a path.

methods.name: fileURLToPath
methods.description: Converts a file URL to a path.

methods.name: compat.extends
methods.description: Method to extend ESLint configurations from a list of base configs.
